description.value:
Character gains Machine(+1) Trait, this cybernetic can be implanted multiple times, increasing the value of the Machine Trait by +1 each time. No Poor Craftsmanship version. Good and Best Craftsmanship make the upgrades less noticable.

Requirements

Rare Availability for Hereteks

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
